Cyber Monday: Virtual Machine Solutions – 128MB OpenVZ $1/yr, 768MB KVM $6/yr and more!

cyber monday, kvm, openvz, virmach, virmach.com November 28, 2016 @ 8:00 am, by Jon Biloh

We’re very excited about this exclusive offer submitted by Amir from Virmach.com! This Black Friday and Cyber Monday seems to be the first wave of deep discounts on big memory KVM plans, and Virmach’s offers certainly do not disappoint!

First, the typical run down, Virmach has been featured on Low End Box three times before, most recently in July 2016, where their offer was received with much positive attention. Amir and his team are active in the Low End Box and Low End Talk communities, which means they are always working to ensure customers are happy. The WHOIS for Virmach is public, they are a registered company (see here) and their terms of service can be reviewed here. Accepted payment methods include PayPal, Credit and Debit card and Bitcoin.

In their own words Virmach is worth your attention because:

VirMach is the perfect balance between affordable services and amazing quality. We use powerful nodes with RAID 10 solid state drives in 9 locations. Our OpenVZ servers are far from oversold, with most servers averaging at just 30% RAM usage, 20% CPU usage, and 15% of the network throughput being used at any given time. Should you opt in to go with our KVM line of plans, we offer Windows licensing absolutely free of charge. Speaking of free: our main location at Buffalo comes with free DDoS protection for everyone, and we provide amazing support at no extra charge with an average 3 hour response time. We guarantee 100% uptime, so in the rare event of a downtime, our system administrators are immediately informed by our system; day or night, they will immediately resolve the issue and provide you with a free week of service upon request, even if your service was only down for a few minutes.

There are a total of seven offers available, including OpenVZ for 99 cents per year (WOW!), 2GB KVM for $5/month and 8GB KVM for $10/month plus much more. Read more to get all the details, and don’t wait because these great offers will be gone before you know it.

Special KVM 2GB @ $5/mo

  • 2GB RAM
  • 1x vCPU @ 2GHz+
  • 20GB SSD space
  • 2TB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • 3x IPv6 (where available)
  • KVM/SolusVM
  • Windows Available (Licensed, Free)
  • Coupon: LEBBF2016G2
  • $5/month
  • Order here
